title: My Way Up
lyrics:
Shun On Da Beat
I'm on my way up
Ain't takin' no pay cut (Ayy)
Lil' baby I'm caked up (Ayy)
These niggas they play tough (Ayy)

But I'ma go get me some paper (Ayy)

I sip on lean, but you can blaze up (Ayy)

Keep a big old beam for the takers (Ayy)

Gotta make some G's on the way up

Baby you can see I got my weight up (Mmm)

(Shun On Da Beat)



These niggas try to take me down

But I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I done pulled up to your house

Baby I'm on my way up

I'm on my way up

I'm on my way up (Hey)



Say, I been gettin' off a long time ago

Ain't got time to joke 'cause I been on a roll

Hustlin' for my folks is who I do it for

The- these niggas hoes, they don't want no smoke

I do it for the people who ain't got no hope

The ones that goin' through it, stressed and dead broke

Can't get a break and need to pra ysome more

On their last limb tryin' to stay afloat

Niggas tryin' to take me down

But I'm gonna keep the Louie boots pressed to they throat

Big- Big ol' four, nigga, pressed in my coat

Ain't worried about it, havin' sex with a hoe

Niggas tryin' to make me frown

And I'm gonna stay dressed down to the toe

Remember nights nigga slept through the cold?

Momma cryin', face wet, clothes soaked?

Not no more, nigga walk with my head up and chest out

I used to be stressed out, but nigga I'm blessed now

My momma she set now, baby you can rest now

Long as I'm livin' it won't be no let down

People upset now, but now I can flex now

"Yella come to town", "Yella nigga, hit the set now"

A lil irritatin' nigga, only thing I regret now

They used to shit on me but now show respect now



Ain't takin' no pay cut (Ayy)

Lil' baby I'm caked up (Ayy)

These niggas they play tough (Ayy)

But I'ma go get me some paper (Ayy)

I sip on lean, but you can blaze up (Ayy)

Keep a big old beam for the takers (Ayy)

Gotta make some G's on the way up

Baby you can see I got my weight up (Mmm)



These niggas try to take me down

But I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I done pulled up to your house

Baby I'm on my way up

I'm on my way up

I'm on my way up



Okay, Okay, I'm on my way

Cat- cat out the bag, go straight to the safe

These niggas they're jake, that mean they fake

If you do not fuck with me you can't relate

They- they- they can't relate, that mean they hate

Baby come here with me, come take a taste

If- if- if you gon' be with me, come at the A

Act a gorilla that's straight out the gate

But I cannot change up

Keep it gangsta, that's the way I came up

A- actin' tough'll get you banged up

These niggas out here stressin', strained up

These niggas keep bringin' my name up

No I will not get you famous

Pussy nigga really lame to us

Hell nah, they ain't came with us

These niggas be trippin, actin' like bitches

Hold all that gossipin', get out your feelings

Motherfuckers so fearless, actin' like women

While I'm out here tryin' to run up my digits

"Did you say digits?" Yeah, I said digits

Y'all niggas playin, tryin' to get me a ticket

E- e- everything I do, I square it, squad business

Keep a deuce deuce in my shoe like I'm Emmitt



Ain't takin' no pay cut (Ayy)

(Shun On Da Beat)

Lil' baby I'm caked up (Ayy)

These niggas they play tough (Ayy)

But I'ma go get me some paper (Ayy)

I sip on lean, but you can blaze up (Ayy)

Keep a big old beam for the takers (Ayy)

Gotta make some G's on the way up

Baby you can see I got my weight up (Mmm)



These niggas try to take me down

But I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I done pulled up to your house (House)

Baby I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I'm on my way up (Yeah)

I'm on my way up (Yeah)
